SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

ortus
Class daemon

java.lang.Object
  ortus.daemon

public class daemon
extends java.lang.Object

Daemon class Main object for the Ortus subsystem A Static daemon object should be created at the start of the STV The shutdown method should be called to cleanup the daemon

Author:
jphipps

Constructor Summary
daemon()
          Constructor Build a new ortus deamon object This loads the default path for configuration paths Builds all objects used by ortus ** Must be build at the STV startup **

GetMedia

public static java.lang.Object[] GetMedia(java.lang.Object o1)
Get MediaObjects that match the passed filters

Parameters:
o1 - Genre Array
Returns:
Media Objects

GetMedia

public static java.lang.Object[] GetMedia(java.lang.String filter,
                                          java.lang.Object o1)
Get Media Objects that match the passed filters and Genres

Parameters:
filter - Any Sage Filter, such as IsTVFile, IsLibraryFile, etc.. Plus OrtusIsSeries - Match shows that is marked a series in ortus OrtusIsMovie - Match shows that is marked as a movie in ortus OrtusIsTVMovie - Match shows that is marked as a TV Movie in ortus OrtusIsImported - Match a show that is marked as an imported show in ortus OrtusIsRecording - Match a show that is marked as a Sage recording by ortus
o1 - Genre Array
Returns:
